data.eml:eml: A new species of Frontodendroidopsis (Coleoptera: Pyrochroidae: Pyrochroinae) from China, with a key to males of the three species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Young, Daniel K. (2017): A new species of Frontodendroidopsis (Coleoptera: Pyrochroidae: Pyrochroinae) from China, with a key to males of the three species. Zootaxa 4319 (3): 590-594, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4319.3.10
